availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ezekiel L. Barnes (Lincoln County, Tennessee, and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Lincoln County, Tennessee, and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary Anne Barnes. Father of Sarah Jane Barnes, Nancy E. Barnes, [Unknown] Barnes, William A. O. Barnes, James Barnes, E. M. Barnes, and S. E. Barnes. Farmer in Lincoln County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Lincoln County, Subdivision 1, p. 163B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 795.
